website_summaries.verdict: Plenty of heft in a shingle hammer that makes it easy to drive nails and trim shingles.
pros: Has a one-piece construction that ensures it will last a long time
Handle cover is comfortable to hold, and it reduces vibration in the hand, too
Gives you a retractable blade for between 4 and 5.625 inches of exposure
Level of build quality is perfect for the professional in this "Made in America" product
Good price for a big hammer
cons: Weighs 28 ounces, so it gives plenty of power, but it also may wear you out

customer_reviews.title: Absurdly durable and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Absurdly durable and very effective. Estwing is the master class of hammers. The wide head and short body allows for hammering down old nails at rapid succession.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Erdman

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty!
customer_reviews.text: I work in roofing and this hammer is a must. However, it is a heavy hammer so at end of day your arms feel it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Constructed
customer_reviews.text: Using this everyday and it is a well balanced hammer with a good grip. Hard to go wrong with a Estwing
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my son. Just what he wanted for roofing.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a Christmas gift my son he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Haylansi

customer_reviews.title: Great manufacturer, seller sent incomplete item.
customer_reviews.text: Great Hammer but...ordered two, one arrived without the shingle gauge. Not great but contacted Estwing and they were super-understanding and sent a replacement right away.
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: a mans hammer for sure
customer_reviews.text: these hammers are meant to get the tough joba done . extremely impressed with the craftmanship of these bad boys.
customer_reviews.author: Denn

customer_reviews.title: East wing roofing hatchet
customer_reviews.text: I've used a east wing hammer hatchet for years, I like the new one it is 28 oz perfect for one hit roofing nail sink
customer_reviews.author: Chris Payne

customer_reviews.title: the last shingling hatchet you will own.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shingle hammer available. My grandfather had one just like it. Great craftsmanship and quality. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Ironboy70

customer_reviews.title: nice tool
customer_reviews.text: such a lovely littte hammer. Blue grippy guy thing on the handle and the head is really shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Lathers hatchet
customer_reviews.text: Best lathing hatchet around. Don't waste your time roofing, leave that to the scabs. Come to think of it, don't waste your time lathing, leave it to the pros. RIP 42L & L440
customer_reviews.author: Crayola Kid

product_meta.title: Estwing Shingler's Hammer - 28 oz Roofer's Tool with Milled Face & Shock Reduction Grip - E3-CA
product_meta.description:
Estwing's Solid Steel Milled Face Shingler's Hammer has a fully polished head and handle neck, molded on nylon vinyl grip and a retractable cutting blade. Adjustable for 4", 5", 5-5/8" exposure.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Cuts and trims all types of composition shingles, standard and metric. Forged, one piece, solid steel to eliminate loose heads. Nylon vinyl grip bonded to handle for comfort and duability. Fully polished with new slotted retractable and replaceable cutting blade.
feature_bullets: FORGED IN ONE PIECE – The most durable, longest lasting striking tools available
BUILT FOR THE PRO – Roofers, framers, contractors, tradesman & serious DIYers
PATENTED SHOCK REDUCTION GRIP – Comfortable, durable & reduces impact vibration by 70%
MADE IN THE USA – Our tools are proudly crafted in Rockford, IL using the finest American steel

VERSATILITY ON THE JOB – Gauge for setting reveal of shingles & blade to trim roofing felt & asphalt shingles. Retractable blade is adjustable for 4”, 5”, 5-5/8” exposure. The blade and gauge are replaceable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars28 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
